name: NARC
description:
NARC is an action-shooter game developed by Point of View. It came out on 21-03-2005. It was published by Midway Games. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
NARC is available on PC and PlayStation 2.
Jesse Taylor, Lee Jacobson, Mark Beaumont and Mark Teal produced the game. Frank Arnot, Jesse Taylor, Michael Terlecki and Tom Hall directed the game.
